properties.name: recaptcha.validation.request-param-name
properties.description: The request parameter name for the reCAPTCHA response.

properties.name: recaptcha.validation.site-key
properties.description: Your Google reCAPTCHA site key. Obtain from Google reCAPTCHA Admin Console.
